data.text: @JuanSy74955789 @SabinehazanMD @BiomeSquad @Progenabiome Well today’s update is they don’t know whats wrong with her still, yet she can’t breath without the ppak, but this afternoon they put oxygen tubes up nose. Not sure if there is any medicine included.  No visits allowed. Still testing. Maybe infection of some sort.

@snipsnap_3 @yajvin @SabinehazanMD @BiomeSquad @Progenabiome Hopefully they'll allow parents to treat neuro immune and inflammatory disorders in natural ways without scapegoating parents as fringe conspiracy noncompliant
@ApterBob @SabinehazanMD @BiomeSquad @Progenabiome Thank you for the link though.

@SabinehazanMD @BiomeSquad @Progenabiome I still have covid nose. I can smell normally but the“air”smells like cigarettes off an on. Sometimes in the middle of the night I wake up to that smell. I always have essential oil on a tissue to help (lavender and peppermint) I’m fine at the moment. Do you have any suggestions?

@SabinehazanMD @AllegriaNoel @finley_susie @BiomeSquad @Progenabiome Your saying it lives in the gut and keeps doing damage? Once it damages the cardiovascular system via infection do you believe it can be reversed?

@finley_susie @SabinehazanMD @BiomeSquad @Progenabiome He’s short of breath when walking up simple stairs high blood pressure. Not sure if damage is reversible. He thought he was fortunate he got the “mild omicron” to boost his immune system…
